Configurations :

Product Attributes - Brand, Shape, Size, Material, Gender & Color.

Contact form â€“ Prescription details. (studio)

Opportunities Form â€“ Related Field from contact form for prescription details (studio)

Print Report â€“ Prescription report printing option in contact form (studio)

Prescription details in website â€“ An option to fill up the prescription details/upload document/enter contact details before check out in website ( Configure form for "Extra Step Before Checkout").


Workflow


Flow 1: Sale, order to cash


  • Create a Quotation with "Ray-ban RB0707S", then confirm the order.
  • Go to Inventory > Delivery orders
    • Select the serial numbers
    • Validate the delivery order
  • From the sale order, create the invoice
  • On the invoice, click "Register Payment"


Flow 2: Replenishment


Odoo automates the propositions of products to replenish. To check the list, go to Inventory > .Operations > Replenishment. Then perform the following operations.

  • "Ray-ban RB0707S" will be replenished from vendor.
  • "Dolce & Gabbana DG2256" is not available in New York Warehouse, so Odoo proposes to replenish from Texas Warehouse where stock is available.


2.1 Replenish from Vendor

    • Create purchase quotation from Inventory > .Operations > Replenishment.
    • Confirm a purchase quotation from purchase > request for quotation.
    • Go to Inventory > Operation > Receipts.
    • Validate the receipt.

2.2 Replenish from another warehouse.

    • Create replenishment orders from Texas Warehouse to New York Warehouse.
    • From Inventory > Operation > Deliveries, validate delivery from Texas Warehouse.
    • From Inventory > Operation > Receipts validate receipts in New York Warehouse.


Flow 3: Booking appointment for eye tests


From online appointment

  • Go to "Eye Test Appointments (New York)"
  • Fill up appointment slot, contact details & confirm appointment.

To manage appointments, the showroom manager uses the CRM where all the information about the customer request are available:

  • Navigate to CRM > Opportunities
  • Select the opportunity which is generated an appointment is confirmed.
  • Mention details such as Lens or Glass prescription.
  • Open the customer form in order print prescription details.

Flow 4 : Online Shopping


From the online shop:

  • Add product "ACUVUE - Oasys with Hydraclear Plus" to cart
  • Proceed to checkout
  • As lenses need prescriptions, the user will have to fill information during checkout process.
  • Select products and proceed to checkout.
Use discount code "FreedomFest" before checkout to get a discount on your order
